original_text: But who are you, O man, to answer back to God? Will what is molded say to its molder, “Why have you made me like this?”
korean_text: 이 사람아 네가 누구이기에 감히 하나님께 반문하느냐 지음을 받은 물건이 지은 자에게 어찌 나를 이같이 만들었느냐 말하겠느냐

sentences.original_text: But who are you, O man
Will what is molded say to its molder
“Why have you made me like this?”
